Durante la guerra in Bosnia ed Erzegovina, Ajla, una donna bosgnacca tenuta prigioniera in un campo di concentramento, e Danijel, un soldato serbo, vivono una storia d'amore, nonostante siano immersi nelle atrocitÃƒÂ  del conflitto.........

[img]http://s19.postimg.org/fzn6g380j/1_story.png[/img]

During the Bosnian War, Danijel, a soldier fighting for the Serbs, re-encounters Ajla, a Bosnian who's now a captive in his camp he oversees. Their once promising connection has become ambiguous as their motives have changed.........
